sentences.en: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.cn: 虽然我很快便让他相信我是清白的，但是我想他仍然非常怀疑我是否神志正常。

sentences.en: At present nothing is possible except to extend the area of sanity little by little.
sentences.cn: 目前除了把神志清醒的人的范围一点一滴地加以扩大以外,别的事情都是不可能的.

sentences.en: He had moments of sanity, but he couldn't maintain the balance.
sentences.cn: 他也有心智正常的时候, 但不能持续多久.

sentences.en: He pleads for sanity in a lunatic world.
sentences.cn: 他祈求在这混乱的世界里仍能保持头脑清明。

sentences.en: His behaviour was so strange that I began to doubt his sanity.
sentences.cn: 他行为怪异，我有点怀疑他是否神智正常。

sentences.en: His strange remarks planted doubts in our minds about his sanity.
sentences.cn: 他那些怪话使我们心中生疑,不知他精神是否正常.

sentences.en: I began to doubt his sanity.
sentences.cn: 我开始怀疑他是否神志正常。

sentences.en: Rafsanjani has been considering various ways of introducing some sanity into the currency market.
sentences.cn: 拉夫桑贾尼一直考虑通过各种方式使货币市场趋于理性。

sentences.en: Sanity and happiness are an impossible combination.
sentences.cn: 睿智和幸福是无法兼得的。

sentences.en: Sanity of judgment has never deserted him.
sentences.cn: 他从未失去明达的判断力.

sentences.en: She managed to keep her sanity throughout the ordeal.
sentences.cn: 在那场磨难中她始终保持神志正常.

sentences.en: She wondered if she was losing her sanity .
sentences.cn: 她怀疑自己是否精神有问题。

sentences.en: Until recently Sammy has seemed to be retaining his hard sanity.
sentences.cn: 不久之前,山米看来还是能够保持清醒的头脑.

sentences.en: War was a sure safeguard of sanity.
sentences.cn: 战争是保持神志清醒的可靠保障.

sentences.en: Where there is equality there can be sanity.
sentences.cn: 凡是有平等的地方,就有神志清醒.

sentences.en: With the passing of Fisher from the scene, sanity had returned.
sentences.cn: 费希尔离职后恢复了理智.

sentences.en: You would not make the act of submission which is the price of sanity.
sentences.cn: 你不愿为神志健全付出顺从的代价.
